name: Purgatory's Flame
description:
Trigger Warnings: Suicide Ideation, Substance Abuse, Heartbreak

Purgatory's Flame is an interactive Twine story about old lovers recounting their relationship as they await their soon-approaching deaths. This is their last conversation together.

This conversation, over glasses of wine, peels back the layers of their relationship. It showcases the ugly, the sacred, the difficult, the tender, and the back-and-forths around determining why the supposed soul mates' relationship failed.
